title: Create Interview - Select Skills
expected_result: Skills are saved and difficulty level options are displayed

title: Create Interview - Create Interview
expected_result: Unique public interview link is generated

title: Create Interview - Advanced Plan - Select AI Avatar
expected_result: AI avatar is selected and lip syncing is enabled

title: Test Candidate Video Interview
steps: Click on the candidate's video interview
Verify the candidate's skills versus scores are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's interview score and communication score are displayed

title: Test Candidate Scoring Summary
steps: Navigate to the interview screenings section
Click on the AI analyze scores section
Verify the comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed
expected_result: The summary includes observations, positives, and negatives, and an action button to select or reject the candidate

title: Test Resume Screening
steps: Navigate to the resume screening section
Verify the AI commences the screening process
expected_result: The AI evaluates candidates based on their skills and assigns a resume score

title: Test Resume Score Recommendations
steps: Navigate to the resume screening section
Verify the AI recommends suitable candidates based on the job description
expected_result: The AI recommends candidates with resumes that align with the job requirements

title: Test Interview Invitation
steps: Navigate to the resume screening section
Click on the 'Send interview link' button
Verify the candidate receives an interview link valid for 24 hours
expected_result: The candidate can submit their interview at their convenience

title: Test Interview Screening Process
steps: Navigate to the interview screening section
Verify the candidate's interview is displayed
Click on the 'Initiate interview screening' button
expected_result: The interview screening process is initiated, and the summary is displayed
